long_description: Featuring soft, comfortable fabric and a streamlined design, the Salomon Start shorts let you keep your focus on your running, not your gear. Polyester fabric wicks moisture, dries quickly and moves with you during demanding training sessions; built-in UPF 50+ sun protection shields skin from harmful UV rays. Soft liner shorts offer additional moisture-wicking and quick-drying performance; adjustable waist dials in the fit. Zippered pocket provides handy storage for small items you may want to bring along. Salomon Start running shorts feature reflective logos for increased visibility in low light. Closeout.
short_description: Featuring soft, comfortable fabric and a streamlined design, the Salomon Start shorts let you keep your focus on your running, not your gear.
